tool_description:
JSON API for geolocating IP addresses
Free monthly requests: 100k.
IP info provided: coordinates, city, timezone, country, continent, ASN & others.
name: IP Geolocator
title: IP Geolocator

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.description: Check if the API is up and running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocator1.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: IP lookup
api_list.description: ## Retrieve an IP address geolocation and ASN informations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocator1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/lookup/72.30.2.43"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocator1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/lookup/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
